description: Backend manifest and dependency graph for LLM-driven web app.
llm_notes: All backend entities are referenced by unique IDs. This file is the single source of truth for backend structure.

rules: All changes must be made through LLM-optimized data files (JSON schemas for endpoints, logic, models, etc.).
Direct manipulation of runtime code is prohibited unless strictly necessary to expand system expressivity.
The LLM-optimized files are the canonical source for all features, logic, and tests.
Document and justify any deviation from these rules.
llm_guidelines.purpose: Ensure all LLMs and agents working with this system understand and comply with the LLM-driven workflow and constraints.
